participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and enthusiastic, enjoys sharing experiences and is always looking for ways to improve.
participant_1.background: I read a lot about paganism and spirituality and try to live my life in accordance with those beliefs. I am the leader of the french fry research department at Del Taco. I'm enjoying my time after college, jogging is a great way to stay in shape. I read ebooks on my commute and in my car, so I can enjoy my favorite books while I'm on the go. I am a dog walker.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Active and health-conscious, values fitness and enjoys spending time outdoors. Friendly and optimistic.
participant_2.background: I don't own a car because I like to walk or ride my bike. I went to a bar in San Francisco to celebrate my birthday with friends. I am going to school to get my bachelor's degree. I love to run fast. I'm not good at keeping up with my exercise routine, but I know it's important for my health.

content.text: Hey, I'm doing great! How are you?
I'm good, thanks! I'm just getting ready for my run.
Oh, that's cool! I love running, too. I'm not very good at keeping up with my exercise routine, but I know it's important for my health.
Yeah, it definitely is. I try to run every day, but sometimes I have to skip a day or two.
I wish I could run every day! I usually only run about three times a week.
That's still good! It's all about consistency.
Yeah, you're right. I'm just glad I'm able to get out and run at all.
Me too! It's so much fun and it's a great way to de-stress.
I agree! I love running because it clears my head and I can just focus on my breathing and the movement.
It's the best! I'm glad we both love running.
Me too! I'm sure we'll run into each other at a race one day.
I'd love that! We can keep each other motivated.
